Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. It is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence and quality. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value lies well beyond $1200000. However, for your consideration, I am offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $1100000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to make a decision soon to secure this extraordinary opportunity. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
